title: In carnage...
body:
I bloooom.

Like a flower, on the lawn.

But then I get mowed because I have no escapes.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/e848751e716b49b19fc9ac6d4cfd5f0f.png

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Glowshtick,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3LbudFrB,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-21T02:43:55.484+0000)
>
> I bloooom.
> 
> Like a flower, on the lawn.
> 
> But then I get mowed because I have no escapes.
> 
> http://image.prntscr.com/image/e848751e716b49b19fc9ac6d4cfd5f0f.png

Wait what I thought it went "Like a flower in the dawn"
That's the joke. He changed it so the rest of his poem woild logically follow.

Downvoted to 4.

Sometimes, beauty is agonizing.
The post and is top 3 posts are 4 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
It was so good I couldn't not upvote. I'm sorry Jihn.

You have not yet mastered the art of the Jhinku! Let me help you:

Like a flower
Upon the lawn,
I bloom in death,
but am mow'd down.

upvoted to 5
and
 5th comment
and
5 lines of txt (bring on the hate, lol)
I may have pushed you to 5, but perfection like this should reach 44, or 444
I logged in on another account just to downvote it so it stays to 4
{{champion:202}} : An artist creates their own path.
